Thank you for this.

The quality is absolutely fine. I've heard a lot worse!

This is a really nice gem.

Northcote-Parkinson was one of Britain's foremost naval Historians and a Wodehouse maniac. 
He had always wanted to add more to the mysterious background of Jeeves and as a tribute to 'The Master' who he met several times, he wrote this 'historical biography' of Jeeves.
